title: Ashe Ult
body: So if Ashe ults a Pyke, should Pyke be revealed or stay stealthed after being hit with ult!?

replies.body: If someone on her team is within Pyke's detection radius, he will be revealed when hit by her ult (and also revealed before and after, as long as someone is near him). Or you can reveal him with a spell that has such an effect. Ashe's ult is only damage and CC, so it won't reveal him.
